mapper.sql: id,title,brief,cover_path coverPath, video_path videoPath,upload_time uploadTime, category_id categoryId,user_id userId,group_id groupId,status
mapper.select: select v.id id,v.title videoTitle,v.cover_path cover,v.video_path path, v.upload_time uploadTime,v.brief description,c.cate_name cateName, u.id userId,c.parent_id categoryId,u.nick_name userName from yx_user u RIGHT JOIN yx_video v ON u.id = v.user_id LEFT JOIN yx_category c on c.id = v.category_id where v.title like '%${content}%' ORDER BY v.upload_time DESC
